title: Slashes
text:
Slashes
You wounded me
stripped me of my life
left me here to die,
while I slept
Slit my throat
again and again
without knowing
the pain you cause
Open my wounds
open my memories
force me to remember
force me to suffer
all that without knowing
the pain you cause

replies.text: thetta er svoldid splatter en hey gott ljod
Átakanlegt.  Svona blóðug ljóð ýta alltaf pínu við manni…mí læk ðatt.
